name: Gumi
text: (Allah) Mai rahama.

name: Gumi
text: Yã sanar da Alƙur'ani.

name: Gumi
text: Yã halitta mutum.

name: Gumi
text: Yã sanar da shi bayãni (magana).

name: Gumi
text: Rãnã da watã a kan lissãfi suke.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma tsirrai mãsu yãɗo da itãce sunã tawãlu'i.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma samã Ya ɗaukaka ta, Kuma Yã aza sikẽli.

name: Gumi
text: Dõmin kada ku karkatar da sikẽlin.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ku daidaita awo da ãdalci, kuma kada ku rage sikẽlin.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ƙasã Yã aza ta dõmin tãlikai.

name: Gumi
text: A cikinta akwai 'ya'yan itãcen marmari da dabĩno mai kwasfa.

name: Gumi
text: Da ƙwãya mai sõshiya da ƙamshi.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangjinku kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Yã halitta mutum daga ƙẽkasasshen yumɓu kumar kasko.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma ya halitta aljani daga bira daga wutã.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Ubangjin mafita biyu na rãnã, kuma Ubangijin mafãɗã biyu na rãnã.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Yã garwaya tẽku biyu (ruwan dãɗi da na zartsi) sunã haɗuwa.

name: Gumi
text: A tsakãninsu akwai shãmaki, bã za su ƙetare haddi ba.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Lu'ulu'u da murjãni na fita daga gare su.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Yanã da manyan jirãge, waɗanda ake ƙãgãwa a cikin tẽku kamar manyan duwãtsu.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Dukkan wanda ke kanta mai ƙãrẽwa ne.

name: Gumi
text: Kuma Fuskarar Ubangijinka, Mai girman Jalala da karimci, ita ce take wanzuwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: wanda ke a cikin sammai da ƙasã yanã rõƙon Sa (Allah), a kullum Allah na a cikin wani sha'ani.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Zã mu ɗauki lõkaci sabõda ku, yã kũ mãsu nauyin halitta biyu!

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Ya jama'ar aljannu da mutãne! Idan kunã iya zarcẽwa daga sãsannin sammai da ƙasã to ku zarce. Bã za ku iya zarcẽwaba fãce da wani dalĩli.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Anã sako wani harshe daga wata wutã a kanku, da narkakkiyar tagulla. To, bã zã ku nẽmi taimako ba?

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Sa'an nan idan sama ta tsãge kuma ta zama jã kamar jar fãta.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: To, a ran nan bã zã a tambayi wani mutum laifinsa ba, kuma haka aljani.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: zã a iya sanin mãsu laifi da alãmarsu, sabõda haka sai a kãma kwarkaɗarsu da sãwãyensu.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Wannan Jahannama ce wadda mãsu laifi ke ƙaryatãwa game da ita.

name: Gumi
text: Sunã kẽwaya a tsakaninta da ruwan ɗimi mai tsananin tafasa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma wanda ya ji tsõron tsayãwa a gaba ga Ubangijinsa yanã da Aljanna biyu.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Mãsu rassan itãce.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu akwai marẽmari biyu sunã gudãna.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu akwai nau'i biyu daga kõwane 'ya'yan itãcen marmari.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Sunã gincire a kan waɗansu shimfiɗu cikinsu tufãfin alharĩni mai kauri ne kuma nũnannun 'yã'yan itãcen Aljannar biyu kusakusa suke.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu akwai mãtã mãsu taƙaita ganinsu, wani mutum, gabanin mazajensu bai ɗebe budurcinsu ba kuma haka wani aljani.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Kamar dai su yaƙũtu ne da murjãni.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Shin, kyautatãwa nã da wani sakamako? (Ã'aha) fãce kyautatãwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Kuma baicinsu akwai waɗansu gidãjen Aljanna biyu.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Mãsu duhun inuwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu akwai marẽmari biyu masu kwarãrar ruwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu akwai 'ya'yan itãcen marmari da dabĩno darummãni.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: A cikinsu, akwai wasu mãtã mãsu kyaun hãlãye, mãsu kyaun halitta.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Mãsu farin idãnu da baƙinsu waɗanda aka tsare a cikin haimõmi.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Wani mutum, gabanin mazajensu bai ɗẽbe budurcinsu ba, kuma haka wani aljani.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Sunã gincire a kan wasu matãsai mãsu kõren launi da katĩfun Abkara kyãwãwa.

name: Gumi
text: To, sabõda wanne daga ni'imõmin Ubangijinku, kuke ƙaryatãwa?

name: Gumi
text: Sũnan Ubangjinka, Mai girman Jalãla da Karimci, ya tsarkaka.
